brandGuidance.style: Subtle, natural effects. Particles should feel organic, not digital.
brandGuidance.magic: Warmth-based only - ember motes, firefly lights, NOT energy beams or neon
brandGuidance.combat: Physical impacts - dust, sparks from metal, cloth movement. NOT anime slash effects.
brandGuidance.environment: Weather, atmosphere, natural phenomena - fog, rain, wind-blown leaves

prompt.subject: Floating ember particles - warmth/magic indicator
prompt.description: Tiny floating embers that rise from fires, checkpoints, the Everember. Like fireflies made of warmth.
prompt.variants: 8 variations: different sizes (tiny, small), different glow intensities, some with small trail
prompt.color: Warm orange-amber, soft glow, NOT harsh
prompt.animation: Static sprites, animation handled by particle system (rotation, fade)
prompt.usage: Near all fire sources, Everember, activated checkpoints, during healing
prompt.style: Pixel art, 16x16 each, very soft edges, warm colors
prompt.negative: NO sparks, NO electricity, NO geometric shapes

prompt.subject: Floating dust particles - interior atmosphere
prompt.description: Tiny dust motes visible in light beams. Creates lived-in atmosphere.
prompt.color: Pale cream/tan, very subtle, barely visible
prompt.usage: Archives, Great Hall, anywhere with light beams through windows

prompt.subject: Autumn leaves - outdoor atmosphere
prompt.description: Falling leaves for forest and exterior scenes. Gentle drift animation.
prompt.variants: 8 leaves: oak, willow, maple shapes. Colors: gold, orange, brown, one green
prompt.usage: Abbey exterior, River Path, Courtyard in autumn wind
prompt.negative: NO cherry blossoms (wrong aesthetic), NO neon colors

prompt.subject: Snow particles and frost crystals - Zephyros/storm atmosphere
prompt.description: Cold weather effects for final chapter and Zephyros encounters.
prompt.variants: Snowflakes (4 sizes), frost crystals (4 angular shapes)
prompt.color: White with pale blue tinge, semi-transparent
prompt.usage: Final chapter ramparts, Zephyros boss arena, during storm

prompt.subject: Sword swing visual arc - attack feedback
prompt.description: Subtle motion arc showing sword path. NOT anime slash effect.
prompt.appearance: Faint gray-white arc like motion blur, dissipates quickly
prompt.style: Minimal, realistic motion blur effect, NOT stylized
prompt.negative: NO colored energy, NO glowing lines, NO anime slash marks

prompt.subject: Hit impact effect - combat feedback
prompt.description: Dust/debris puff when attacks connect. Physical, not magical.
prompt.appearance: Small burst of dust, fur tufts, maybe tiny sparks if metal-on-metal
prompt.animation: 5 frames: burst, expand, dissipate, fade, gone
prompt.color: Dusty brown/gray, subtle orange sparks for metal hits
prompt.negative: NO blood, NO gore, NO energy bursts

prompt.subject: Dust puff when landing from jump
prompt.description: Small dust cloud at feet when player lands. Adds weight to movement.
prompt.animation: 4 frames: impact, puff outward, settle, gone
prompt.color: Light brown dust, varies slightly by biome (stone = gray)

prompt.subject: Healing effect - warmth spreading through character
prompt.description: When health is restored, warm light spreads upward through character. Like being wrapped in warmth.
prompt.appearance: Soft amber glow rising from feet to head, ember motes rising with it
prompt.animation: 6 frames: glow at feet, rising, at chest, at head, spreading outward, fading
prompt.style: Pixel art, overlay effect, warm ember colors
prompt.negative: NO green healing (RPG trope), NO sparkles, NO crosses/hearts

prompt.subject: Checkpoint brazier igniting - save point activation
prompt.description: Burst of warmth when checkpoint is activated. Welcoming, not explosive.
prompt.appearance: Warm light pulses outward from brazier, ember motes scatter then settle
prompt.animation: 8 frames: spark, catch, flare, pulse outward, settle, glow steady, embers rising, loop point
prompt.style: Pixel art, warm colors, gentle pulse not explosion
prompt.negative: NO fire explosion, NO aggressive burst

prompt.subject: Damage indicator - brief flash when hit
prompt.description: Simple red-white flash overlay applied to character sprite when taking damage.
prompt.usage: Applied as additive blend to character for 2-3 frames when hit

prompt.subject: Zephyros frost breath - boss attack effect
prompt.description: Cloud of freezing mist expelled by Zephyros. NOT a laser beam. Think dragon breath but cold.
prompt.appearance: Rolling fog cloud with ice crystals visible within, spreads and dissipates
prompt.animation: 8 frames: exhale start, cloud forming, spreading, peak coverage, thinning, dissipating, ice crystals settling, clear
prompt.color: Pale blue-white, semi-transparent, ice crystal glints
prompt.style: Pixel art, atmospheric, threatening but natural
prompt.negative: NO laser, NO energy beam, NO geometric patterns

prompt.subject: Wind gust visual - storm atmosphere
prompt.description: Horizontal wind lines for storm/rooftop chapters. Shows wind direction and intensity.
prompt.appearance: Subtle gray-white streaks moving horizontally, varying lengths
prompt.animation: 4 frames: sparse, building, peak intensity, easing
prompt.usage: Bell Tower climb, rampart battle, storm sequences
prompt.negative: NO anime speed lines, NO colored wind

prompt.subject: Water splash - river/puddle interaction
prompt.description: Splash effect when landing in or near water.
prompt.animation: 5 frames: impact, droplets up, peak, falling, settling ripples
prompt.usage: River Path, Courtyard puddles, any water interaction
prompt.negative: NO cartoon splash, NO solid shapes
